main event: A sighting of a yellowish-red object resembling a basketball with a trail of fire in Sweetwater, Texas.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 1 minute., The object appeared to be getting smaller as it moved., The description of the object is typical of a meteor., The observation was made from ground level., The report was verified by the boy's father and neighbors.
sighted object: yellowish-red object with a trail of fire
